definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: They are strictly vegetarian and eat all manner of deep fried food.
sentences.chinese: 他们是严格的食素者，吃各种各样的油炸食品。

sentences.english: The doughboy was a predecessor of the doughnut.
sentences.chinese: 油炸面团是甜甜圈的前身。

sentences.english: The fat in the fryer had heated all right.
sentences.chinese: 油炸锅里的食油已经热了。

sentences.english: Fried mutton fat with onions goes well with vodka.
sentences.chinese: 油炸肥羊肉伴洋葱，再加上一杯伏特加就是绝配了。

sentences.english: Government in its attempt to start the market floor, is more valuable than the deep-fried .
sentences.chinese: 政府在其尝试启动市场地板，更有价值比油炸。

sentences.english: The liver is served in a soup, and the spine is deep-fried and eaten like a cracker.
sentences.chinese: 肝脏入汤，油炸透的脊骨可以当饼干吃。

sentences.english: Deep frying at high temperatures both wipes out the bacteria and turns the stinky tofu sweetly fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 高温油炸既有杀菌效果，同时也能让臭豆腐转臭为香。

sentences.english: The oil temperature should control about three tenths, avoids fries in oil when the sweet dumplings served in soup bursting.
sentences.chinese: 油温应控制在三成左右，以避免油炸时汤圆破裂。

sentences.english: Effects of lactic fermentation on fried lotus root chips were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本实验研究了乳酸发酵对油炸藕片质量的影响。

sentences.english: What do you think about the concept of a no-fry fryer?
sentences.chinese: 您对这无油炸锅是怎么想的呢？

sentences.english: Frying onions. Local food is very greasy.
sentences.chinese: 油炸洋葱，这里的菜都很油腻。

sentences.english: The cashew nuts contain a toxin which is eliminated through frying.
sentences.chinese: 腰果坚果含有毒素，油炸后便会除掉。

sentences.english: Won tons are usually boiled and served in soup, but they can also be deep-fried.
sentences.chinese: 馄饨通常是煮好和汤一起吃的，但也可以油炸。

sentences.english: Vinnie: Those are sesame doughnuts with extra caffeine added.
sentences.chinese: 那些是加了咖啡因油炸面包圈。

sentences.english: It was horrible, Mom, everything in the cafeteria was deep-fried.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈太恐怖了，餐厅里所有的吃的都是油炸的。

sentences.english: Gangu County in the streets, a common one of the stalls selling fried potato chips.
sentences.chinese: 在甘谷县街头，常见一个个卖油炸洋芋片的小摊。

definition: to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
